intro: reaches deep within, touching the wellspring of rage and fury
embraces the darkness within, channeling raw emotion and anger
delves into the shadowed depths of their soul, drawing upon forbidden power
surrenders to passion and anger, letting darkness flow through them
taps into the primal fury that lurks beneath the surface
manifestation: The air crackles with malevolent energy as shadows seem to deepen around them
A palpable aura of menace radiates outward, making the Force itself recoil
Dark energy writhes and coils around their form like living smoke
The temperature drops as the Force bends unnaturally to their will
Reality warps subtly, corrupted by the touch of the dark side

intro: reaches out with their mind, touching the consciousness around them
extends their awareness beyond their body, sensing thoughts and emotions
opens themselves to the Force, their consciousness expanding outward
sends tendrils of thought through the Force, seeking connection
projects their will into the minds of others through invisible threads of power
manifestation: An invisible presence brushes against the minds of those nearby
The Force flows like water between minds, carrying thoughts and intentions
Reality seems to shimmer as mental energy permeates the space
A subtle pressure builds in the minds of those touched by the power
The boundary between self and other blurs for just a moment

intro: reaches out with invisible hands of Force energy
extends their will into the physical world, grasping objects with pure thought
channels the Force into a tangible extension of themselves
focuses on the objects around them, bending reality to their will
calls upon the Force to manipulate the material world
manifestation: Objects tremble and rise as if gripped by unseen hands
The air ripples visibly as waves of telekinetic force radiate outward
Reality bends as matter yields to the power of pure will
Items shift and hover, defying gravity through Force manipulation
The Force manifests as a tangible pressure moving through space

intro: focuses inward, enhancing their physical form with Force energy
channels the Force through their body, transcending mortal limitations
draws upon the Living Force to augment their capabilities
becomes one with the Force, body and energy flowing together
taps into reservoirs of power deep within themselves
manifestation: Their movements take on an otherworldly grace and precision
Energy courses through their veins, visible as a faint aura
They move with impossible speed and strength, defying natural limits
The Force suffuses their being, elevating them beyond mere flesh
Power radiates from them as they transcend their physical form

intro: reaches out with gentle tendrils of healing energy
channels the Living Force into wounds and injuries
focuses their compassion into restorative power
touches the broken flesh with light-side energy
calls upon the Force to mend what has been torn
manifestation: A warm, soothing energy flows into the injured
Wounds begin to knit and close with unnatural speed
The healing light of the Force banishes pain and damage
Vitality returns as the Force restores what was lost
Life energy pulses and flows, reversing injury and trauma

intro: wraps themselves in protective layers of Force energy
creates a barrier between themselves and harm
channels defensive power into an invisible shield
focuses their will into a protective cocoon of energy
draws the Force around themselves like armor
manifestation: An invisible barrier shimmers into existence around them
The Force forms a protective shell, deflecting danger
Energy crackles and flows in defensive patterns
Reality bends around them, creating a pocket of safety
The air hardens into an impenetrable barrier of pure will

Force Lightning.description: summons arcs of devastating Force Lightning from their fingertips
Force Lightning.manifestation: Blue-white electricity crackles and arcs through the air, illuminating everything with its terrible power

Force Storm.description: conjures a massive storm of Force energy and lightning
Force Storm.manifestation: The sky darkens as reality itself tears apart, unleashing a maelstrom of destructive power

Force Grip.description: reaches out with invisible hands to crush and choke their target
Force Grip.manifestation: The victim rises into the air, clutching at their throat as an invisible force constricts around them

Force Slam.description: hurls their target through the air with overwhelming telekinetic force
Force Slam.manifestation: The target is violently thrown backwards as if struck by a giant invisible fist

Mind Trick.description: weaves subtle suggestions into the mind of their target
Mind Trick.manifestation: A glazed look passes over the target's eyes as their will bends to the Force user's words

Battle Meditation.description: spreads their consciousness across the battlefield, bolstering allies and weakening foes
Battle Meditation.manifestation: Waves of calm confidence flow to allies while enemies feel doubt and confusion creep into their minds

Move Object.description: lifts and manipulates objects through the air with telekinetic power
Move Object.manifestation: Objects float and dance through the air, moving with graceful precision guided by thought alone

Force Cloak.description: bends light and perception around themselves, fading from view
Force Cloak.manifestation: They seem to blur and fade, becoming nearly invisible as the Force shields them from sight

Force Sense.description: opens themselves to the currents of the Force, sensing danger and disturbances
Force Sense.manifestation: Their eyes unfocus as awareness expands, perceiving threats before they manifest

Drain Life.description: siphons the very life essence from their victim to sustain themselves
Drain Life.manifestation: Dark tendrils of energy flow from the victim to the Force user, carrying stolen vitality

Vital Transfer.description: transfers their own life energy to heal another
Vital Transfer.manifestation: Golden light flows between Force user and recipient, carrying healing energy

Force Scream.description: releases a devastating shockwave of pure dark side rage
Force Scream.manifestation: Reality itself seems to shatter as the Force-amplified scream tears through the area

Rebuke.description: projects a wave of Force energy to push back and stun opponents
Rebuke.manifestation: An invisible wave of power radiates outward, staggering all in its path

Farseeing.description: casts their perception across vast distances and through time itself
Farseeing.manifestation: Their eyes glow faintly as visions of distant places and times fill their mind

Sever Force.description: tears away another's connection to the Force itself
Sever Force.manifestation: Invisible threads of Force energy are severed, leaving the victim cut off from the cosmic power

Force Weapon.description: imbues their weapon with crackling Force energy
Force Weapon.manifestation: Their weapon glows with power, wreathed in visible Force energy that hums with potential
